Main character head icon for Singleplayer/Local Multiplayer
This loads another head icon instead if for some reason the first icon couldn't be found, useful if the first icon is from a custom character
Tricks the game into thinking you're playing on the said stage, adding camera zooms and shit like that
name: Fangirls Gambit
Name to be shown on Singleplayer/Local Multiplayer and Discord's Rich Presence
Decimal value of a color's hex, format is ARGB, convert it to decimal with the calculator (Add an 'FF' at the start though)
